Items.Name: Process
Items.Description: Set of practices, terms, workflows and custom fields that can be applied to Project.

ResourceMetadataRemarksDescription.Body: Result of GET request is ordered by Name field with ascending direction.

Items.Name: Tag
Items.Description: Tags that can be attached to entities.

ResourceMetadataRemarksDescription.Body: Result of GET request is ordered by Name field with ascending direction.
Result of GET request is ordered by Name field with ascending direction.

Items.Name: EntityType
Items.Description: Type of Entity. For example: Bug, TestCase, Project.

Items.Name: Name
Items.Description: Entity type name e.g. Bug, TestCase, Project.

Items.Name: IsExtendable
Items.Description: Shows if entity type can be extended with custom fields.

Items.Name: IsSearchable
Items.Description: Shows if entities of this entity type can be searched.

Items.Name: EntityStates
Items.Description: Collection of possible states for entity type

ResourceMetadataRemarksDescription.Body: Result of GET request is ordered by Name field with ascending direction.

Items.Name: Priority
Items.Description: Priority of User Story, Bug or Feature. Examples: Must Have, Nice to Have.

Items.Name: Importance
Items.Description: Priority importance. Minimal value is of the highest importance.

ResourceMetadataRemarksDescription.Body: Result of GET request is ordered by Importance field with ascending direction.

Items.Name: Severity
Items.Description: Severity (badness) of Bug. For example, Blocking, Critical, Small.

Items.Name: Importance
Items.Description: Defines severity importance. Minimal value is of the highest importance

ResourceMetadataRemarksDescription.Body: Result of GET request is ordered by Importance field with ascending direction.

Items.Name: EntityState
Items.Description: State of Entity. Collection of EntityStates form Workflow for Entity. For example, Bug has four EntityStates by default: Open, Fixed, Invalid and Done.

Items.Name: Name
Items.Description: State name. For example, Open or Done

Items.Name: IsInitial
Items.Description: Defines if state is initial. Only one initial state is allowed

Items.Name: IsFinal
Items.Description: Defines if the state is final. Only one final state is allowed

Items.Name: IsPlanned
Items.Description: Defines if the state is planned.

Items.Name: IsCommentRequired
Items.Description: Defines whether comment is required if state is changed to another state

Items.Name: NumericPriority
Items.Description: Priority of entity. Used for sorting

Items.Name: EntityType
Items.Description: Entity type where entity state is found (Bug, Project, etc)

Items.Name: Process
Items.Description: Process where entity state is found

ResourceMetadataRemarksDescription.Body: Result of GET request is ordered by NumericPriority field with ascending direction.

Items.Name: General
Items.Description: Base entity for Assignable, Build, Impediment, Iteration, Program, Project, Release, Test Case, Test Plan, Bug, Feature, Request, Task, Test Plan Run, User Story.

Items.Name: StartDate
Items.Description: Start date for time-boxed entities such as Iteration, Project, Release

Items.Name: EndDate
Items.Description: End date for time-boxed entities such as Iteration, Project, Release

Items.Name: EntityType
Items.Description: Type of entity e.g. Bug, Feature, Task, etc.

Items.Name: Project
Items.Description: Project where this entity is found

Items.Name: Assignable
Items.Description: Base entity for User Story, Task, Bug, Test Plan Run, Feature, Request. It can be assigned to people and has workflow.

Items.Name: StartDate
Items.Description: Start date for time-boxed entities such as Iteration, Project, Release

Items.Name: EndDate
Items.Description: End date for time-boxed entities such as Iteration, Project, Release

Items.Name: Effort
Items.Description: Total efforts for assignable.Read-only calculated field

Items.Name: EffortCompleted
Items.Description: Effort spent on assignment. Read-only calculated field

Items.Name: EffortToDo
Items.Description: Effort required to complete assignment. Read-only calculated field

Items.Name: TimeSpent
Items.Description: Total time spent on assignment. Read-only calculated field

Items.Name: TimeRemain
Items.Description: Total time remaining to complete assignment for Role. Read-only calculated field

Items.Description: Type of entity e.g. Bug, Feature, Task, etc.

Items.Name: Project
Items.Description: Project where this entity is found

Items.Description: Assignable entity can be assigned to Release or can be in project Backlog (Release is not defined in this case)

Items.Description: Assignable entity can be assigned to Iteration

Items.Description: Assignable entity can be assigned to team Iteration

Items.Description: A blocking reason that impedes work on assignable entity

Items.Description: Collection of time entries posted to assignable entity

Items.Description: Collection of efforts for all roles

Items.Description: Base entity for User and Requester.

Items.Description: Determines whether user is active in the system

Items.Name: Assignables
Items.Description: All entities assigned to this user

Items.Name: TestCase
Items.Description: A set of steps to determine if a product functionality is working correctly. TestCase relates to User Story.

Items.Name: StartDate
Items.Description: Start date for time-boxed entities such as Iteration, Project, Release

Items.Name: EndDate
Items.Description: End date for time-boxed entities such as Iteration, Project, Release

Items.Name: Steps
Items.Description: Steps that should be executed to test functionality

Items.Name: LastStatus
Items.Description: Defines whether test case passed or failed last time. True - passed, False - failed

Items.Name: LastFailureComment
Items.Description: Comment that describes failure if it occurred last time

Items.Name: LastRunDate
Items.Description: Date when test case was run last time

Items.Name: EntityType
Items.Description: Type of entity e.g. Bug, Feature, Task, etc.

Items.Name: Project
Items.Description: Project where this entity is found

Items.Name: UserStory
Items.Description: User story where test case is found

Items.Name: TestPlans
Items.Description: User story where test case is found

ResourceMetadataRemarksDescription.Body: Result of GET request is ordered by Name field with ascending direction.

Items.Name: TestCaseRun
Items.Description: A single Test Case Run. TestCase can be run many times. It is impossible to create a Test Case Run, instead Add Test Case to Test Plan to create a Test Case Run

Items.Name: TestPlan
Items.Description: A group of TestCases. For example, you can create 'Smoke Tests' TestPlan and add TestCases there.

Items.Name: Impediment
Items.Description: Anything that prevents a team member from working as efficiently as possible. Impediment can relate to Task, User Story, Bug or Feature.

Items.Description: Start date for time-boxed entities such as Iteration, Project, Release

Items.Name: EndDate

Items.Name: Company
Items.Description: Used to limit Requests visibility in Help Desk. Requesters from Company A will not see Requests from Company B.

ResourceMetadataRemarksDescription.Body: Result of GET request is ordered by Name field with ascending direction.

Items.Name: RoleEffort
Items.Description: Effort for Assignable by Role. For example, User Story can have 5 hours of Developer effort + 3 hours of Tester effort. The total effort will be 8 hours.

ResourceMetadataRemarksDescription.Body: Result of GET request is ordered by Role field with ascending direction.

Items.Name: ProjectMember
Items.Description: Any User that is a part of a Project Team.

Items.Description: Any User that is a part of a Team.

Items.Name: TeamProject
Items.Description: Any Project in which team participates.

Items.Description: Defines if message was processed by Target Processs

Items.Name: CustomField
Items.Description: Custom field is an entity extension which is declared on a process level. As a result entity can contain declared custom field values. Custom fields has following types: Text, DropDown, CheckBox, Url, Date, RichText, Number, Entity. See reference for more details.

Items.Name: Name
Items.Description: The name of the custom field

Items.Name: Value
Items.Description: Predefined values of the custom field. Example: possible values for multiselect field

Items.Name: FieldType
Items.Description: Custom field type: Text, Numeric, etc.

Items.Name: Required
Items.Description: Field value should be set for entity

Items.Name: EntityType
Items.Description: Entity type extended with this custom field

Items.Name: Master
Items.Description: The main entity in the relation.

Items.Name: Slave
Items.Description: The secondary entity in the relation.

Items.Name: Attachment
Items.Description: A file (image, archive, whatever) attached to Entity.

Items.Name: Context
Items.Description: Context contains information about logged User, Culture, selected Projects and Processes.

Items.Name: Acid
Items.Description: Application context ID. Unique value for a set of projects

Items.Name: SelectedProjects
Items.Description: Collection of selected projects in the context

Items.Name: SelectedTeams
Items.Description: Collection of selected teams in the context

Items.Name: Processes
Items.Description: Collection of selected processes in the context

Items.Name: Culture
Items.Description: Culture which was selected in application. Affects date formats and decimal separator.

Items.Name: Name
Items.Description: The culture name in the format [languagecode2]-[country/regioncode2],           where [languagecode2] is a lowercase two-letter code derived from ISO 639-1 and [country/regioncode2] is an uppercase           two-letter code derived from ISO 3166. For example, en-US

Items.Name: ShortDateFormat
Items.Description: Short date format for the culture

Items.Name: LongDateFormat
Items.Description: Long date format for the culture

Items.Name: TimePattern
Items.Description: Time format for the culture according to http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/az4se3k1(v=vs.71).aspx

Items.Name: Terms
Items.Description: Collection of terms of the process

Items.Name: CustomFields
Items.Description: Collection of custom fields information of the process

Items.Name: Practices
Items.Description: Collection of practices of the process

Items.Name: Term
Items.Description: Term in Process. Like Bug, User Story, Feature, etc.

Items.Name: CustomFieldInfo
Items.Description: Information about custom field in a Process.

Items.Name: EntityKind
Items.Description: Entity kind to which custom field is defined

Items.Name: Type
Items.Description: Type of the custom field value. For example, DropDown or Text

Items.Name: Required
Items.Description: Determines whether custom field is required

Items.Name: Listed
Items.Description: Determines whether custom field is shown in lists

Items.Name: Process
Items.Description: Process to which project info belongs

Items.Name: Program
Items.Description: Program to which project info belongs
